questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to lead a team through a challenging project. How did you ensure success?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Led team of 5 developers to deliver project ahead of schedule
questions.suggestedAnswer: Focus on your leadership style, communication strategies, and how you motivated the team. Mention specific challenges and solutions.

questions.question: Describe a technical challenge you faced and how you solved it. What was your approach?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Improved system capacity by 300% through architecture overhaul
questions.suggestedAnswer: Walk through your technical problem-solving process, including analysis, solution design, and implementation.

questions.question: Give me an example of how you improved a process or system. What was the outcome?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Reduced customer response time by 80% with AI chatbot implementation
questions.suggestedAnswer: Explain your process improvement methodology and quantify the results achieved.

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to work with a difficult stakeholder. How did you handle it?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Successfully coordinated with multiple teams during system migration
questions.suggestedAnswer: Focus on communication skills, empathy, and conflict resolution strategies.

questions.question: Describe a situation where you had to make a decision with incomplete information. What was your process?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Made critical architecture decisions during system overhaul
questions.suggestedAnswer: Explain your decision-making framework and how you manage uncertainty.

questions.question: How do you stay updated with the latest technologies and industry trends?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Completed advanced certification in cloud architecture
questions.suggestedAnswer: Discuss your learning strategies, resources you use, and how you apply new knowledge.

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to mentor or teach someone. What was your approach?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Mentored 3 junior developers and improved team productivity
questions.suggestedAnswer: Focus on your mentoring style, how you assessed their needs, and the outcomes achieved.

questions.question: Describe a project where you had to work with a tight deadline. How did you manage it?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Delivered critical project ahead of schedule with high quality
questions.suggestedAnswer: Explain your project management approach, prioritization strategies, and how you ensured quality.

questions.question: How do you handle feedback and criticism? Can you give me an example?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Improved code quality standards based on team feedback
questions.suggestedAnswer: Show your growth mindset and how you use feedback to improve.

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to learn a new technology quickly. How did you approach it?
questions.basedOnAchievement: Learned new framework and implemented it in production within 2 weeks
questions.suggestedAnswer: Discuss your learning methodology and how you applied the new knowledge.
